content: x 1 2 2 k 3 1 3 sm ssk k to end of round round 2 k to marker sm k 0 2 0 p1 k3 to m sm work next row of glitter drop pattern across the front of the sock sm k3 p1 x 1 2 2 k 3 1 3 sm k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have decreased down to your original stitch count with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock k to m sm this is now your bor and you can remove the other bor marker as you work the next round foot continue working in established pattern until the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending 3 glitter drop socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together pm place marker knit knit bor beginning of round k tbl knit through back loop sm slip marker purl purl repeat the bracketed sts the indicated number of times ssk sl 1 knitwise sl 1 knitwise place both sts back on the left needle and k2tog through the p1 elongated purl a stitch wrapping yarn back loop twice on next row drop the extra wrap from needle as you slip it purlwise with yarn at sl 1 slip purlwise with yarn at back back glitter drop chart glitter drop pattern written instructions row 1 p2 p1 elongated p3 × 2 p1 elongated p2 13 sts row 2 - 5 p2 sl 1 p3 × 2 sl 1 p2 row 6 knit row 7 p1 p3 p1 elongated x 2 p4 row 8 - 11 p4 sl 1 p3 sl 1 p4 row 12 knit 4 glitter drop socks by debbie ford
